reviewText:
she bendy - but empty vessel - a daoist form - but she not practice
daoist principles in her life - all about her ego

I practice this every morning and am experiencing some of the benefits, in a short amount of time.  This form seems to diminish appetite and works the entire body.
There is no verbal instruction but that's fine with me; there is a front and back view and it's done slowly enough to follow.  There is also a sword form and fan form,
on this dvd.
